newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian T-bill trade - 1.06 trln rbls transferred.
newsitem.headline: Russian T-bill trade - 1.06 trln rbls transferred.

text.p: Government securities dealers had transferred 1.06 trillion roubles to their accounts on the government securities trading system before the market opened on Monday, the central bank's open-market operations department said.

Only money transferred to trading accounts before the market opens at 11 a.m. (0700 GMT) is available for investing in paper that day and is an indication of potential demand for GKO discount Treasury bills and OFZ interest-bearing government bonds.

The total limit for short positions available to dealers licensed to conduct repo operations remains 2.00 trillion roubles. The rate for repos taken out on Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday remains 18 percent and that for repos taken out on Thursday and Friday remains 21 percent. Repos taken out today will expire on July 23.
Details of the last few days' transfers, and the central bank's net intervention in the market a week ago, can be seen on page CBGKOINF.
